Vigilance
Azorius Knight-Arbiter can't be blocked.
cards.flavor_text: Thanks to the magic of his Writ of Passage, alms beasts lumbered aside, anarchs bowed their heads, and even Rakdos acrobats rolled their spikewheels out of his way.

cards.name: Biogenic Ooze
cards.oracle_text:
When Biogenic Ooze enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token.
At the beginning of your end step, put a +1/+1 counter on each Ooze you control.
{1}{G}{G}{G}: Create a 2/2 green Ooze creature token.

cards.name: Blade Juggler
cards.oracle_text:
Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

cards.name: Bolrac-Clan Crusher
cards.oracle_text: {T}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Bolrac-Clan Crusher deals 2 damage to any target.
cards.flavor_text: Jaharg discovered that the shapes and symmetries so pleasing to the sculptor's eye also yielded a well-balanced bludgeon.

card_faces.name: Carnival
card_faces.oracle_text: Carnival deals 1 damage to target creature or planeswalker and 1 damage to that permanent's controller.

card_faces.name: Carnage
card_faces.oracle_text: Carnage deals 3 damage to target opponent. That player discards two cards.

cards.name: Catacomb Crocodile
cards.flavor_text:
"I am sewer-king!" said Rat. "I am quick and cunning and I know every tunnel."
"No, I am king!" said Zombie. "I am cold and deadly and no rot can harm me."
Then Croc came and ate them both.

cards.name: Chillbringer
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When Chillbringer enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
cards.flavor_text: If you can see your breath, it's too late to run.

cards.name: Clear the Stage
cards.oracle_text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you may return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: "Make way! It's time for the final act!"

cards.name: Domri's Nodorog
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
When Domri's Nodorog enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Domri, City Smasher, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
cards.flavor_text: "Good girl."

cards.name: Galloping Lizrog
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
When Galloping Lizrog enters the battlefield, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from among creatures you control. If you do, put twice that many +1/+1 counters on Galloping Lizrog.
cards.flavor_text:
"I might have overfed him."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

cards.name: Get the Point
cards.oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Scry 1.
cards.flavor_text:
"Vraska sees the grandeur in death but misses the hilarity."
—Judith

cards.name: Grasping Thrull
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When Grasping Thrull enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each opponent and you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: "Debt due! Debt due!" The thrull's screeching makes children flinch and debtors quail. "Debt due!"

cards.name: Humongulus
cards.oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
cards.flavor_text: Searching the city for Fblthp felt like sifting the rain for a single drop of blood.

cards.name: Knight of Sorrows
cards.oracle_text:
Knight of Sorrows can block an additional creature each combat.
Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)
cards.flavor_text: The helmet reveals no eyes to witness your penance, no mouth to offer absolution.

cards.name: Lumbering Battlement
cards.oracle_text:
Vigilance
When Lumbering Battlement enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nontoken creatures you control until it leaves the battlefield.
Lumbering Battlement gets +2/+2 for each card exiled with it.

cards.name: Mammoth Spider
cards.oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
cards.flavor_text:
"The good news is that the migrating drakes are no longer a problem."
—Bell Migellic, Azorius hussar

Mesmerizing Benthid has hexproof as long as you control an Illusion.

cards.name: Nikya of the Old Ways
cards.oracle_text:
You can't cast noncreature spells.
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
cards.flavor_text: "The hooves of the Raze-Boar will trample the weak—and their city—to dust!"

cards.name: Orzhov Racketeers

Whenever Orzhov Racketeers deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Afterlife 2 (When this creature dies, create two 1/1 white and black Spirit creature tokens with flying.)
cards.flavor_text: "Looks like you need protection."

cards.name: Precognitive Perception
cards.oracle_text:
Draw three cards.

cards.flavor_text: "To control the present we must master the future."

cards.name: Rampaging Rendhorn
cards.oracle_text: Riot (This creature enters the battlefield with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)

cards.name: Regenesis
cards.oracle_text: Return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand.

—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

cards.oracle_text:
Flying

cards.flavor_text: "Citizen! Your crime has been recorded. Cease movement and await arrest, or further penalties will be immediately imposed."

Flying, trample
